CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(refedge__Content_URL__c), '', HYPERLINK('/apex/' + $Setup.refedge__POR_App_Configuration__c.refedge__Namespace__c + 'DownloadLinkPage?Id=' + Id + '&ContentURL=' + refedge__Content_URL__c + refedge__Content_URL2__c, refedge__Content_URL__c, "_blank"))
CustomField.label: Content URL
